level.text: The provisions of §§ 411 and 400.7 shall apply to roof structures in the HE District.
The gross floor area of roof structures permitted under this section shall not be counted in determining the amount of off-street parking that is required by Chapter 21.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking and Order No. 04-05 published at 56 DCR 6181 (August 7, 2009); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4316 (May 20, 2011).
